name: Plumb Crazy
overview: Not to be confused with 1984 "Plumb Crazy!", Plumb Crazy is a remake of its namesake for Atari ST. The game is a take of the classic puzzler Pipe Dream. Your goal is to construct a large enough network of pipes before the time runs out and the water starts to flow. The game was released in both Loadstar #154, and in the fourth from the last Loadstar #247 in 2007.
